```{r RefSef info, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning =FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Data for the table
data <- data.frame(Species = c("Balanococcus diminutus", "Nilaparvata lugens", "Placoccus citri", "Rhopalosiphum maidis", "Spodoptera frugiperda", "Plutella xylostella", "Pieris rapae", "Bicyclus anyana", "Ostrinia nubilalis", "Vaneaa cardui", "Pieris brassicae"),
                   
Order = c("Hemiptera", "Hemiptera", "Hemiptera", "Hemiptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera", "Lepidoptera"), 

Common_Name = c("N/A", "Brown planthopper", "Citrus mealybug", "Corn leaf aphid", "Fall armyworm", "Diamondback moth", "Cabbage white", "Squinting bush brown", "European corn borer", "Painted Lady", "Large cabbage white"),

Size = c("313.1 Mb", "1.1 Gb", "403.6 Mb", "326 Mb", "383.9 Mb", "323.3 Mb", "256.4 Mb","457.2 Mb", "495.5 Mb", "424.8 Mb", "292.3 Mb"), 

Origin = c("United Kingdom", "Wuhan, China", "United Kingdom", "Ithaca, NY", "Australia", "United Kingdom", "United Kingdom", "United Kingdom", "United Kingdom", "United Kingdom", "United Kingdom"), 

Assembly_Method = c("PacBio & Arima2", "WTDGB v. 2.1, SmartDenovo v. 1.5, & HiC-Pro v 2.7.8", "PacBio, Arima2", "Canu v. 1.6 & Hi-C chromatin interation maps", "CANU v. 2.2.0; PurgeDups v. 1.2.5; AllHiC v. 1; Racon v. 1.4.3; Masurca-Polca v. 4.0.9", "77x PacBio data, 10X Genomics Chromium data, & Arima2 Hi-C data", "56x PacBio data, 10X Genomics Chromium data, & Arima Hi-C", "20x PacBio data & Arima2 Hi-C", "44x PacBio data & Arima2 Hi-C", "25x PacBio data, 10X Genomics Chromium data, & Arima Hi-C", "92x PacBio data, 10X Genomics Chromium data, & Qiagen Hi-C"),

Publication_Link = c("https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCA_959613365.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_014356525.2/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_950023065.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_003676215.2/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_023101765.2/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_932276165.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_905147795.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_947172395.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_963855985.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_905220365.1/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_905147105.1/"))


# Italicize the species names
data$Species <- paste0("*", data$Species, "*")

# Define the factor levels and corresponding colors for Order column
order_levels <- c("Lepidoptera", "Orthoptera", "Hemiptera")
order_colors <- c("#D8B2D8", "#008080", "#D8D8B2")

# Map colors based on factor levels
data$Color <- order_colors[match(data$Order, order_levels)]
data$Color[is.na(data$Color)] <- "#FFFFFF"  # Default color for NA values

# Apply cell_spec with correct color mapping to Order column
data$Order <- cell_spec(
  data$Order, 
  background = data$Color
)

# Select the Species column
data <- data[c("Species", "Order", "Common_Name", "Size", "Origin", "Assembly_Method", "Publication_Link")]
 
# Create the table
kable(data, "html", escape = FALSE, caption = "") %>%
  
  kable_styling() %>%
  
  scroll_box(width="1000px", height="500px")%>%

  add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "Available NCBI Information of Members of Orthoptera & Other Orders in Insecta" = 6))
  
```
